metadata.title: CVE-2018-25014 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A use of uninitialized value was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1in ReadSymbol().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-25014` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp6 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
webp - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwebp package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu1').
